attributes.action: Stop Russian Oligarchs selling assets based in UK
attributes.additional_details: In defiance of Russian aggression against Ukraine and help finance Ukrainian reparations
attributes.background: Sieze all Russian Oligarchs owned assets in the UK, no exceptions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
